snippet: Porzingis, who has a strained quadriceps, said he felt a pinch near his hip running up the court Sunday afternoon at practice but also said, “We’re just being cautious.”
abstract: New York Knicks defeat Philadelphia 76ers, 94-88, in preseason game, but rookie Kristaps Porzingis does not play due to mild strain in his leg.
lead_paragraph: Porzingis, who has a strained quadriceps, said he felt a pinch near his hip running up the court Sunday afternoon at practice but also said, “We’re just being cautious.”

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Pro Basketball; Knicks Prevail, but Porzingis Sits Out
headline.main: Kristaps Porzingis Sits Out Knicks’ Preseason Game
